snippet.title: Last Mind Standing - Trailer | Out on STEAM now
snippet.description:
STEAM page link 👇👇
https://store.steampowered.com/
app/3071100/Last_Mind_Standing/
👆👆

Last Mind Standing is a FPS inspired by modern Doom but with my own twist.

Left hand: Powers.
Right hand: Weapons.
Leg: Melee (and Parry!)
You can use all of them at once.

Ammo? Who needs that. Just mow down enemies and parry projectiles to fill up the meter and then use your powers to cause even more destruction, or heal yourself if you need it.

Lots of enemies and bosses with unique attack patterns and behaviors.

Some platforming and deathly traps. When there are no enemies around, the environment will become the enemy.

Metal soundtrack, catchy melodies and riffs. Not humming them will be impossible.

Made with Godot Engine, inspired by modern Doom.

Twitter/X: https://x.com/chairmanmcchair
